alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Haleakala Summit; Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Kohala; Kona; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 3:16AM HST until December 20 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR PORTIONS OF THE BIG ISLAND THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI LANAI KAHOOLAWE AND MAUI THROUGH 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph. Haleakala Summit...West Winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Kahoolawe, Maui and portions of the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to drive, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
